Interface AdministratorManagerRemote

  • All Superinterfaces:

    public interface AdministratorManagerRemote
extends UserRegisteringFunctionalities

        CourseIdDTO newCourse(ProfessorIdDTO theProfessorId,
                    java.lang.String theName,
                    java.lang.String theDescription)
                      throws InvalidArgumentException
        Add a new course to the MPH system
        Parameters:
        theProfessorId - the id of the professor holding the course
        theName - the course name
        theDescription - the course description
        Returns:
        the id of the newly added course
        Throws:
        InvalidArgumentException - if one of the given parameters is not valid
